import React, {useState} from 'react'; import './AddForm.scss'; import { Field, reduxForm } from 'redux-form' import { textField, checkboxField, radioField } from '../../Auth/Fields'; import { validate } from './AddFormVallidate'; import username from '../../Assets/images/username.png'; import password from '../../Assets/images/password.png'; import email from '../../Assets/images/email.png'; import Toggle from '../../Elements/Toggle/Toggle'; import { Radio } from 'antd' const AddForm = props => { const arr = [ { toggleName: 'Active', name1: true, name2: false, value1: 'Yes', value2: 'No' }, { toggleName: 'Supervisor', name1: true, name2: false, value1: 'Yes', value2: 'No' }, { toggleName: 'Team Chat', name1: true, name2: false, value1: 'Allow', value2: 'Disallow' } ] const [ok, setOk] = useState(false) return (
} placeholder='Name' /> } placeholder='Email' /> } placeholder='Password' /> } placeholder='Change Password' />

Active :

Yes {setOk(true)}}>No

Supervisor :

Yes No

Team Chat :

Allow Disallow

Channels Allowed :

All Email
Webchat SMS
Facebook
Twitter
) } export default reduxForm({ form: 'AddForm', validate, })(AddForm)
